Clause: TOWN OF VINTON, VIRGINIA, "Grantor", ROANOKE GAS COMPANY, "Grantee", ROANOKE GAS COMPANY, "Grantor", TOWN OF VINTON, VIRGINIA
Label 1-Answer: TOWN OF VINTON, VIRGINIA ("Grantor"); ROANOKE GAS COMPANY ("Grantee")

Clause: The effective date of the Franchise will be January 1, 2016.
The term of the Franchise shall be twenty (20) years, commencing on January 1, 2016.

GrantorÕs Franchise Fee shall be a percentage share of the base year total annual Franchise Fee, which shall be determined on a pro rata basis according to its percentage share of the total dollar value of GranteeÕs gas sales occurring within the localities during the calendar year.

For each calendar year of the Franchise, each localityÕs percentage share shall be determined by the following formula: total dollar value of GranteeÕs gas sales within LocalityÕs percentage share = the Territorial Limits of the locality total dollar value of GranteeÕs gas sales in the three localities
